about_the_game:
Deck Adventurers II blends deck building with tactical combat for a fantasy JRPG experience. Your adventure starts in a world full of dangers and mystique as you craft your deck, upgrade your cards, and assemble your party of heroes for any challenges ahead!

Recruit New Heroes and Helpers: recruit new heroes and helpers in your adventure and combine their cards/skills to create different groups of strategies.

Unlocking New Cards and Effects: enhance your decks by defeating enemies and unlock new cards & effects as rewards.

Characters Level Up: The heroes gain experience with each fight and level up to increase characteristics. The new levels give heroes an additional "upgrade" to apply to their cards.

Turn-Based Tactical: based on a squared grid that each turn the characters perform a movement and then up to two actions. The possible actions for the player are based on a card system similar to Slay the Spire where you have a rotating deck. The strategy is based on:

- Choose the two heroes that you think are most suitable for the combat
- Optimize their decks and adapt to specific abilities of enemies.
- Use grid positioning to your advantage.
- Play the cards of your actions in the most efficient way.

Traditional JRPG Gameplay: move freely and being able to talk to characters and discover new missions in this fantasy JRPG world. Engage in combat with various creatures and move your adventure forward!
